section.name: External Resources for Ant
section.p: This page lists external resources for Ant: tasks, IDE integration tools, loggers, you name it. If you've written something that should be included, please post all relevant information to one of the mailing lists.
Nothing listed here is directly supported by the Ant developers, if you encounter any problems with them, please use the contact information.

subsection.name: Anakia
subsection.p: Actually, Anakia is more than just an Ant task, it is a an XML transformation tool based on JDOM, Velocity and Ant.

subsection.name: AntRunner
subsection.p: An OpenTool that integrates Ant into the JBuilder IDE.

subsection.name: AntWork
subsection.p: A plugin that integrates Ant into the Jext editor.

subsection.name: Forte module for Ant
subsection.p: A module that integrates Ant into the Forte IDE.
Compatibility: any version of Ant prior to and including Ant 1.3
